root.name: Hamtaro: Ham-Hams Unite!
root.description: Quote from the rear of the box;"Unite the Ham-Hams unlock boss's secret! Hamtaro hops from TV to Game Boy for an adventure starring all the Ham-Hams! Learn Ham-Chat: practice the Ham-Hams' secret language! Reunite the Ham-Hams find all 12 Ham-Hams to learn Boss's secret! Make a Ham-Jam: create dances with Ham-Chat, and then share them with friends if you both have Game Boy Color systems. (You cannot trade with a Game Boy Advance system.)" Zones The game features multiple zones to find Ham-hams, complete tasks, and solve puzzles in. Clubhouse The main hub of the game. Here you can see the Ham-hams you have found, check which are still missing, and perform Ham-jams to Ham-chat moves. Acorn Shrine Sunflower park Sky Garden Sunflower Elementary Ruins Sunflower Market Ham-chat The game features a "Ham-chat" system for interacting with objects. As Hamtaro progresses through the game, he learns new words in Ham-chat to help him on his journey. There are 85 Ham-chat words in the game. Ham-chat WordEnglish Meaning WondachuWonderful DundealSell MingliePlay KrmpkrmpEat See-truInvisible Nokrmp-P Hungry HamsparEnemy Frost-TFreezing GifteeGive Wait-QWait Bye-QGood-bye Nopookie Dislike HamtastPerfect BestestFantastic Hammo Friend Herk-QPowerful Panic-QScary ShashaaHide Ta-dahShow LotsaMany SmoochieLove WishieBeg HamchuKind TuggieTug StickiePoke Gasp-POh no! ChukchukGive up Thank-QThank you SparklieDelight OopsieSorry BizzarooStrange ZuzuzuSleep NopiblooDon't fret TeenieSmall Koochie-QPretty HamsoloLonely Mega-Q Big Yep-PYes No-PNo LookieSee Go-PBathroom PakapakaBite Scrit-TScratch ScoochieClimb DigdigDig Tack-QRoll Hamha Greeting Hif-hifSniff
